subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sheik Mansour bin Zayed al-Nahyan is said to have entered final negotiations for an M.L.S. franchise to play in a privately financed $340 million stadium.
snippet: Sheik Mansour bin Zayed al-Nahyan is said to have entered final negotiations for an M.L.S. franchise to play in a privately financed $340 million stadium.
